title: Daughter of Shadows
description: The tips are good in Hell.The hours are brutal.And the clientele is... interesting.Every night, I cross the Barrier to the demon realm to sling drinks at Hell on Earth, a bar on the edge of Darktown.I’ve always been fascinated by demons. It’s a fascination I’ve never quite learned to control and it just might get me killed.One fateful night, a darkly handsome, not-quite-human patron grabs my arm, leaving a magical mark burnt into my skin.Determined to find out what the mark means, I do the I venture alone into the demon realm.What I discover is terrifying.Things are changing in Darktown. The ancient enchantment that maintains the Barrier between worlds is failing. Demons are breaking into the human realm, ready to kill.And I just might hold the key to restoring the Barrier.Four sexy Darktown residents are magically bound to protect me.But can my dark protectors keep me safe for long enough that I can uncover my true destiny?
author: Zandria West
